title: Analyze 2 two rulers in Machiavelli context

content.question: Machiavelli suggested that a ruler should behave both "like a lion" and "like a fox." Analyze the policies of TWO of the following European rulers, indicating the degree to which they successfully followed Machiavelli's suggestion. Choose two: Elizabeth I of England Henry IV of France Catherine the Great of Russia Frederick II of Prussia Directions: In writing your essays, use specific examples to support your answer. The suggested writing time is 30 minutes.

frqParts.text: Machiavelli suggested that a ruler should behave both "like a lion" and "like a fox." Analyze the policies of TWO of the following European rulers, indicating the degree to which they successfully followed Machiavelli's suggestion. Choose two: Elizabeth I of England Henry IV of France Catherine the Great of Russia Frederick II of Prussia Directions: In writing your essays, use specific examples to support your answer. The suggested writing time is 30 minutes.

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
